TopicTitle: I think I'm spoiled on certain mods now...

Articles.Content:
So over the last week instead of flying missions I was busy debugging rockets. Turns out in K-Scale2 that the Universal Storage cores WILL overheat and explode when on re-entry from say, the Mun. While I was busy testing however, I came across the idea of putting my service modules for crewed flights inside fairings, because I wouldnt need any of it one the ascent anyway. While I was at it, a protective shell for the Command Modules... using fairings.

My current Delta IV Heavy inspired 2 kerbal rocket. Its getting a new name, soon as I can find a suitable Japanese name (seriously wish I knew the language better)

My single Kerbal launcher however is getting a refresh with similar techniques

Cross Section with half the fairings gone.
